resources.string: Tap here to open an image

OCR Dependencies are not yet available. Please check your internet connection and wait for about 5 minutes. If that\'s not the case then please Update Google Play Services to the latest version
Overlay Permission is required for starting Edge Screen; since it needs to float over other apps
